examples.title: HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized
examples.content:
{
	"timestamp": "2020-01-03T04:17:06.006+0000",
	"status": 401,
	"error": "Unauthorized",
	"message": "Full authentication is required to access this resource",
	"path": "/user/delete/:id"
}

examples.title: HTTP/1.1 500 Internal Server Error
examples.content:
{
	"timestamp": "2020-01-03T17:37:02.348+0000",
	"status": 500,
	"error": "Internal Server Error",
	"message": "your error message",
	"trace": "your trace catch",
	"path": "/user/delete/:id"
}

examples.title: HTTP/1.1 200 OK
examples.content:
{
	"timestamp": "2020-01-03T18:03:54.033+0000",
	"status": 200,
	"message": "your success message",
	"data": {
		"id": identify id,
		"name": "your name",
		"lastName": "your last name",
		"phoneNumber": "your phone number",
		"imageUrl": "your account photo",
		"userName": "your user name",
		"email": "your email",
		"roles": [
			"your role"
		]
	}
}
